lines.gurmukhi: jnnI suqih ibKu dyq hyqu kaun rwKY Gru musY pwhrUAw kho kYsy rwKIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Jananee Soutahi Bikhu Dayt Haytu Kaoun Raakhai , Gharu Mousai Paaharooaa Kaho Kaisay Raakheeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: If a mother poisons her son then who will love him? If a watchman robs the house then how can it be protected?

lines.gurmukhi: krIAw jau borY nwv kho kYsy pwvY pwru AgUAwaU bwt pwrY kw pY dInu BwKIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Kareeaa Jau Borai Naav Kaho Kaisay Paavai Paaru , Agooaaoo Baat Paarai Kaa Pai Deenu Bhaakheeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: If a boatman sinks the boat, then how can the passengers reach the shore beyond? If the-leader cheats on the way, then who can be prayed for justice?

lines.gurmukhi: KyqY jau Kwie bwir kaun Dwie rwKnhwru ck√çY krY AinAwau pUCY kaunu swKIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Khaytai Jau Khaai Baari Kaoun Dhaai Raakhanahaaru , Chakravai Karai Aniaau Poochhai Kaounu Saakheeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: If the protecting fence starts eating the crop (caretaker starts destroying the crop) then who will take care of it? If a king becomes unjust who will examine the witness?

lines.gurmukhi: rogIAY jau bYdu mwrY imqR jau kmwvY dRohu gur n mukqu krY kw pY AiBlwKIAY ]221]
lines.transliteration_english: Rogeeai Jau Baidu Maarai Mitr Jau Kamaavai Drohu , Gur N Moukatu Karai Kaa Pai Abhilaakheeai ?221?

Shabad OS B.translation: If a physician kills the patient, a friend betrays his friend, then who can be trusted? If a Guru does not bless his disciple with salvation, then who else can be expected to be saved? (221)
